content: *rug is crocheted in a long strip then sewed together to make a circle classic shaker-inspired design works with all styles of home decor lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60657ad skill level easy + lion® cotton article #760 6 colors 1 ball each plus cotton-ease® article #830 5 colors 2 balls each *11 colors total* *ed note pattern can be made in any combination of colors desired * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm special stitch decrease double_crochet 2 sts together rug is worked with two strands of yarn held together throughout sew adjoining edges of strip together crochet edging to finish
